title: Bug 12398: Accessibility problems
description: I need to first click on one of the "live" areas before it starts working (e.g., the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame).
OB: When launching the Help view, the tab key does not do anything.
EB: When launching the Help view, the tab key should allow navigation within the view.
SR:
1. Launch the Help view.
2. Press the tab key multiple times.
Expected: The focus should move between different elements within the Help view.
Actual: The focus does not move and nothing happens.
